Invitation.msg: Welcome to the War Time game New Game - type 1 Save Game - type 2 Quit - typ 3

NewGame.msg: You found yourself in a big troubles. You are alone in your destroyed house, you need to do something to survive first days of war to be saved. It's getting dark! Choose which place you want to explore tonight! Choose right number to explore location

StayHome.msg: You decided to rest, that's good... You regenerate your HP, but you get hungry
